entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 8:47 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:25 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Overcast. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:25 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
